name: Realtime Randomization
description: This module allows you to auto-randomize after saving any form without user interaction.  It can be used, for example, to randomize someone upon completion of an eligiblity survey.  It supports logic to control randomization, strata, and Data Access Groups.

project-settings.name:
Trigger Form
If specified, randomization will only happen when this form is saved

Trigger Event
If specified, randomization will only happen when a save occurs in this event

Trigger Logic
If specified, randomization will only happen when this logic is true

Enable Debug Logging
(optional) Requires installation and configuration of emLogger

system-settings.name: Enable Debug Logging (system-wide)(optional) Requires installation and configuration of emLogger
